SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.integration.ebs.client.ng

Class AttachmentResolverSpi

java.lang.Object
org.apache.xml.security.utils.resolver.ResourceResolverSpi
ca.openosp.openo.integration.ebs.client.ng.AttachmentResolverSpi
public class AttachmentResolverSpi extends org.apache.xml.security.utils.resolver.ResourceResolverSpi
Resolver for accessing attachment parts within a message.

Purpose

This class resolves URIs that refer to message attachments using the "cid:" (Content-ID) URI scheme. It is primarily used in the context of XML signatures, where the signature refers to an attachment within a SOAP message.

Implementation notes

- Please note that this resolver is not thread safe and it depends on AttachmentCachingInterceptor for initialization of attachments within current thread context. - It resolves URIs that start with a specific prefix (`cid:urn`), extracting the relevant attachment and returning its data stream in an XMLSignatureInput object for further processing.

Error Handling

If an attachment cannot be found or an I/O error occurs while reading the attachment data, a ResourceResolverException is thrown.

Usage

This resolver should be used in conjunction with the AttachmentCachingInterceptor to ensure that the message attachments are properly cached before they are accessed.
